name: Short Circuit V3.2
description:
welcome to short circuit! in this game you are a defective robot that was put in the recycling. you must escape robot inc. by solving puzzles and avoiding security robots! then you must face the final boss to earn your freedom! Comment if you beat it! to beat level 6 you must race the electricity on the path. the controls are listed in-game, but I will list them for you here: \

game controls.

 walk------------------------------------------WASD/arrow keys 

use item------------------------------------------------------M key 

editor controls. 

place tile------------------------------------------------space bar 

rotate tile-----------------------------------------------------R key 

edit/play-------------------------Z key or on-screen button 

eye-dropper-------------------------------------------------E key 

select tile---------------------------click the on-screen pallet
